评论详情: Solid construction, and true to the photo.  I easily clipped it to my hair bow and presto -instant Lolita steampunk.
Was surprised at how well made and heavy this was. Even though I didn't need it for my costume anymore, I kept it anyway to use as a badge.
Très joli pour compléter une tenue originale. Petit bémol sur la fixation qui convient mieux à un revers de veste qu'aux cheveux.
